attributes.action: To take knighthood and ,any other honours off Tony Blair.
attributes.additional_details: Discuss the removal of honours from Tony Blair in the House of Commons. This should be a official debate
attributes.background:
Tony Blair was probably the UK most unpopular PM
Responsible for destabilising the Middle East, with wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.
UK open border policy. Again against public opinion
Failed devolution policies that was a clear attempt to break up the United Kingdom

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
